response: "datenprivatsphäre? was ist das nochmal? 🤔 in zeitalter von big data und surveillance capitalism seems like a myth. everyone wants our data, from corporations to governments. what's the point of having privacy policies if they're not enforced? 🤷‍♂️ time to take matters into our own hands and protect our personal information! #privatsphärefüralle #datenschutz #bigbrotheriswatching"
